react.title: /react-channel
react.description: Send category embeds to a specific channel.
react.detailedDescription: Select a channel for RoleBot to send all configured Category's to and react to. This is the recommend way to use RoleBot.

react.title: /react-role
react.detailedDescription: Create an association between one of your servers roles and a server emoji or default Discord emoji.

react.title: /react-list
react.detailedDescription: Create an association between one of your servers roles and a server emoji or default Discord emoji.

react.title: /react-message
react.description: RoleBot will react to a single message for a single category.
react.detailedDescription: Instead of using RoleBot's default Category embeds you can have RoleBot react to your messages instead! This is one Category per message.

react.title: /react-remove
react.detailedDescription: Don't want a react role anymore? Remove it!

category.title: /category-add
category.description: Add react roles to a category.
category.detailedDescription: Select from a list of your servers categories to add react roles to via buttons. Super simple!

category.title: /category-create
category.detailedDescription: Create a category to organize your react roles in. Make roles mutually exclusive, give it a description to help users understand what the roles are for!

category.title: /category-edit
category.detailedDescription: Made a mistake and want to fix it? Use the edit command!

category.title: /category-list
category.detailedDescription: Listing your categories shows if a category is mutually-exclusive and the react roles, description and title within it.

category.title: /category-remove
category.description: Want to remove a category? Use this.
category.detailedDescription: This will delete the category and free all react roles inside of it.

category.title: /category-update
category.detailedDescription: This command updates an embed sent by the /react-channel command.

general.title: /info
general.detailedDescription: Get the ping, latency, server size and your servers shard.

general.title: /auto-join
general.detailedDescription: Auto join roles are in the works, thanks for understanding!

general.title: /tutorial
general.detailedDescription: This command helps walk you through how to create a basic category and use it for react roles.
